column4: Anyone familiar to to how i can find a task running? I installed Mediatomb, and it seems it is running some sort of Daemon without me launching it. Well i'd like to kill/reboot it, but i can't find it.
(If i run mediatomb myself, i can see it in the process list, but that is _only_ the one i run.)
use ps ax, or look in your /etc/init.d for a start/stop script
